discourse_list.title: Feature in the CV VC Global Report

content.content: Hello Everyone; We would like to feature MakerDAO in the CV VC Global report. It would be great to have someone from the core team write an expert article for the report. Who is CV VC? CV VC was established in 2016, with the intention of exposing the untapped potential of blockchain technology. We are a Swiss VC fund with our own Incubation program and many engagements in the global Ecosystem. What is the report about? The thriving blockchain ecosystem is evolving and changing constantly. The purpose of the CV VC Global Ranking is to give a vivid picture of the situation of international players on a global scale in the blockchain space. Who is involved? The Top global rating is a cooperation between CV VC and PwC, highlighting top blockchain players in diverse company sectors. What does it look like? This is the second edition of a series of ratings that will be updated and published on a yearly basis. You can look at the first one here. We would like to offer you a featured article appearance, please see the pitch deck attached. You can connect to me privately if this is interesting and we can discuss the details.
The featured article appearance deck attached refers to advertising / advertorial content. To be clear, the expectation is that a Core Unit buy a slot in the report ?
